title:
- with feature enabled with MITM-ecdsa-secp256r1
- using openssl s_client select tls version as tls1_3, cipher as ECDSA
and curves as prime256r1
- using issuer CA of BYOK 3072
custom_summary:
openssl s_client -connect facebook.com:443 
-cipher ECDHE-ECDSA-AES256-GCM-SHA384  -curves prime256r1 -tls1_3

Repeat the test with tls version as tls1_2
Repeat the same by changing the MITM as secp384r1 and secp521r1
custom_expected:
MITM should be choosen as RSA2048, since the client requested ec curve is NOT 
supported by server and there is no backup RSA alg configured in MITM.
